Name: SAVED
About the game: SAVED is an arcade top-down shooter with dynamic gameplay. The player needs to dodge the shots and destroy the zombies. They will constantly stay at the epicenter of shots and action The game has several cards with a special style and atmosphere. At each level, a store is available where the player can heal, replenish ammunition, buy new weapons, or upgrade the old one. Collect ammunition and medicines on the maps, which will greatly help in the fight against zombies Features: - 5 different types of weapons - Detailed maps - Customization of weapons - Different types of zombies with their own characteristics
